name: List Available Tools Test
description: Test case for listing available tools through agent interaction

parts.text: List all available tools alphabetically as a bulleted list

Okay, here is an alphabetized list of the available tools:

append_to_file
clean_whitespace
copy_file
create_directory
delete_directory
delete_file
directory_exists
extract_sentences
file_exists
generate_directory_tree
get_file_info
get_file_size
insert_at_line
is_empty_directory
join_with_oxford_comma
list_all_directory_contents
list_directory_contents
move_file
normalize_line_endings
normalize_unicode
read_file_to_string
replace_in_file
smart_split_lines
strip_html_tags
to_camel_case
to_snake_case
to_title_case
validate_file_content
validate_path
write_file_from_string
